title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Eddie's Wine Challenge (Week of 3/1)
itunes:title: Best Bits of the Week with Morgan2 - What You Didn't Hear About Eddie's Wine Challenge (Week of 3/1)
description:
This edition of the podcast features behind the scenes from show members and moments that happened after we turned off the microphones. Morgan2 brings on Eddie to talk about his wine tasting challenge. Raymundo to talk about Employee of the Month. And Lunchbox, Eddie, Raymundo & Scuba Steve to talk about The Battle of the Bands from this week: Tim McGraw vs. Kenny Chesney.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
